Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services

package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services
  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    ch.zhaw.card2brain
     
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    CardService
    CardService is an interface that defines the methods to perform CRUD operations on Card objects.
    CardServiceImpl
    This class provides the implementation for the CardService interface.
    CategoryService
    Interface for the CategoryService class, providing methods for handling and manipulating categories.
    CategoryServiceImpl
    This class provides the implementation for the CategoryService interface.
    InfoService
     
    InfoServiceImpl
    InfoServiceImpl is a class that implements the InfoService interface and provides methods for getting information about cards and categories for a given user.
    LearnService
    LearnService interface provides methods to manage and retrieve information related to learning.
    LearnServiceImpl
    This class is the implementation of the LearnService interface.
    RepetitionService
    RepetitionService interface provides a method to calculate the next repetition date based on the number of correct answers in a row.
    RepetitionServiceImpl
    RepetitionServiceImpl is a service class that implements the RepetitionService interface.
    UserService
    Interface for UserService, providing methods for managing and manipulating User objects.
    UserServiceImpl
    The UserServiceImpl class is an implementation of the UserService interface that provides a set of methods for managing user data in the application, such as adding, updating, and deleting users.
